title: Global Functional Drinks
body:
## When Global Functional Drinks wanted to make a move from Russia to America it tasked us to come up with a strategy that will engage two different audiences for their two separate products.

### ABOUT THE PROJECT

We were tasked with branding two of the products that GFD was planning to bring to America. The first product was targeted at Millenniaâ€™s with a moderate income. To differentiate ourselves we positioned ourselves away from the extreme sports category and more toward the late night crowd.

##### TORNADO ENERGY DRINK
